attributes.action: Follow the Post Office Process for Travel and Subsistance for MP's
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This is a current process that is working; in an organisation that is wholy owned by the goverment.

rejection.details: MPs' expenses are a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
